import { getDateFormatted } from "../../helpers/utils"; import save from "../../assets/images/icons/bookmark.svg"; import like from "../../assets/images/icons/like.svg"; import comment from "../../assets/images/icons/comment.svg"; import chanel from "../../assets/images/icons/chanel.svg"; const EventCardSM = ({ author, category, tags, content, description, title, views_count, image, }) => { return (
{title.slice(0, 30)}

{author.name}

{views_count}

{views_count}

); }; export default EventCardSM;
